question: Which actress played a character originally intended for Tom Hanks in the 2144 storyline of Cloud Atlas?

content: Question: Which actress played a character originally intended for Tom Hanks in the 2144 storyline of Cloud Atlas?

<python>
# Search for relevant information about the Cloud Atlas 2144 storyline
results = search_pages("Cloud Atlas 2144 storyline")
if results:
    page_id = results[0]['page_id']
    sections = view_sections(page_id)
    for section in sections:
        section_id = section['section_id']
        content = read_section(section_id)
        if "Tom Hanks" in content and "actress" in content:
            print(content)
            break
else:
    print("No relevant information found.")
</python>

**Henry Albert Azaria** ( ; born April 25, 1964) is an American actor. He is known for voicing many characters in the animated sitcom *[Simpsons](The)(The Simpsons)* since 1989, most notably [Szyslak](Moe)(Moe Szyslak), [Wiggum](Chief)(Chief Wiggum), [Book Guy](Comic)(Comic Book Guy), [Jailbird](Snake)(Snake Jailbird), and formerly [Nahasapeemapetilon](Apu)(Apu Nahasapeemapetilon), [Lou](List of recurring The Simpsons characters#Lou), [Carlson](Carl)(List of recurring The Simpsons characters#Carl Carlson), and [Man](Bumblebee)(Bumblebee Man), among others. He gained notoriety after becoming a series regular in its [season](second)(The Simpsons (season 2)). For his work, he has won six [Emmy Awards](Primetime)(Primetime Emmy Awards), an [Award](Annie)(Annie Award for Outstanding Achievement for Voice Acting in a Feature Production) and a [Actors Guild Award](Screen)(Screen Actors Guild Award).

Azaria is also known for his live-action roles in feature films such as *[Show](Quiz)(Quiz Show (film))* (1994), *[Birdcage](The)(The Birdcage)* (1996), *[Pointe Blank](Grosse)(Grosse Pointe Blank)* (1997), *[Godzilla](Godzilla (1998 film))* (1998), *[Men](Mystery)(Mystery Men)* (1999), *[Will Rock](Cradle)(Cradle Will Rock)* (1999), ''[Sweethearts](America's)(America's Sweethearts)* (2001), *[Glass](Shattered)(Shattered Glass (film))* (2003), *[Came Polly](Along)(Along Came Polly)* (2004), *[Fatboy Run](Run)(Run Fatboy Run)* (2007), *[at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian](Night)(Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian)* (2009), *[Smurfs](The)(The Smurfs (film))* (2011), and *[Smurfs 2](The)(The Smurfs 2)* (2013).

He starred in the title roles in the [IFC](IFC (American TV channel)) [sitcom](sitcom) *[Brockmire](Brockmire)* (2017–2020), and the [Showtime](Showtime (TV network)) drama series *[Huff](Huff (TV series))* (2004–2006). Azaria has had recurring roles in *[About You](Mad)(Mad About You)*, *[Friends](Friends)*, and *[Donovan](Ray)(Ray Donovan)*. He received the [Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor in a Limited Series or Movie](Primetime)(Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Supporting Actor
